item.description:
Description:

Metropolis Skating Rink 2167 Washington St. Canton, MA 02021 781-575-6660 Admission: Adults $3.00 Children $2.00 Easy access from the highway / RT 93 exit 2A next to Ponkapoag Golf Course.
Public Skating from 2:30 - 4:20 PM, but let's meet there at 2:15 to either rent or put on our skates so that we can enjoy the whole hour and 50 minutes of skating time!

This meetup will not be cancelled unless there is a bad snowstorm that day. I want to skate; therefore, I will be there whether there are 2 or 20 people that sign up.

Please feel free to email me if you have any questions.

$2 Meet-up event fee or no event fee for 2010 annual members.
item.how_to_find_us: I look like my picture. I'll meet you inside the main entrance to the rink.

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Ice Skating Anyone?
